fields_of_interest: Trade, Customs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
Without being active in lobby business, we're following the implementing acts of various EU legislations as it directly impact our business in terms of consulting services to our own customers and as well determines the R&D orientation of the products we develop to answer technically to regulation. 
 
We're following: 
 - EU-FMD : Pharmaceutical regulation 
 - EU-TPD II : Tobacco Product Directive 
 
Our business as solution provider will be impacted by EU-TPD II, we estimated it's now a must to answer the EU survey "Public consultation on the implementation of an EU system for traceability and security features pursuant to Articles 15 and 16 of the Tobacco Products Directive 2014/40/EU". 
It sounds then appropriate to register into the transparency registry in order to be treated as a company and not anonymously.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: On top of our main website (http://www.blue-infinity.com), we have organized with some of our partners a free workshop session (based in our HQ in Geneva) to inform potential customers about regulations, timing and deadlines as well as existing solutions meet regulation's expectations.
goals__remit:
Headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland, blue-infinity’s 600+ award-winning experts provide a unique combination of creative and technical skills to design, implement and operate efficient solutions for digital transformation. 
 
blue-infinity Linked by Isobar believes in ideas without limits. Our digital expertise is backed by robust systems and platforms, and is underpinned by the power and scale of Dentsu Aegis Network, through 40,000 experts in 145 countries who innovate the way brands are built. 
 
We have strategic partnerships with all main actors providing IT services and solutions. 
 
Our clients portfolio is made of: 
- Public administration 
- Banks and financial institutions 
- ONG's 
- Luxury industry 
- Pharmaceutical industry 
- FMCG sector 
- others
